Welcome to the ABN (Amalgamation of Br&ouml;th&euml;r Nations)! We are always delighted to welcome in exclusive nations to add to the amalgam and strengthen our power, influence, and br&ouml;th&euml;rly friendship. We are a peaceful region, but have zero tolerance for misbehaviour amongst our nations!

All be well, in the crust we trust.

- The Commonwealth of Haydonianthemum
